song.englishname: I Will Celebrate/When the Spirit of the Lord

english.segment1: I will celebrate. Sing unto the Lord. I will sing to Him a new song. (repeat)
english.segment2: I will praise Him. I will sing to Him a new song. (repeat)
english.segment3: When the Spirit of the Lord moves in my heart. I will sing like David sang. (repeat)
english.segment4: I will sing. I will sing. I will sing like David sang. (repeat)
english.segment5: I will dance like David danced
english.segment6: I will pray like David prayed (slow)
